## PickActions type

\*

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type PickActions<T> = Pick<{
    [K in keyof T]: PickHandler<T[K]>;
}, {
    [K in keyof T]: T[K] extends Function ? Exclude<K, 'destroy' | 'init'> : never;
}[keyof T]>;
```
